verbs.description: sole survivor of [ARG0: family] [V: doing] [ARGM-MNR: ok] [ARGM-TMP: after ghastly bludgeoning rape a 2-year - old girl who roamed her fort wayne home for two days after her parents and brother were beaten to death] was in good condition today following surgery a police spokesman said but police had no known suspects in the bludgeoning deaths of dan osborne 35 editorial page editor of the fort wayne news - sentinel his wife jane and their 11-year - old son ben osborne formerly worked for the tulsa tribune they were killed friday night with a blunt instrument allen county coroner roland ahlbrand said the bodies were found monday ahlbrand called the murders bizarre and at best confusing thomas r engle family mrs osborne t craig ladwig fort wayne baseball rape allen county jane caroline fort wayne hospital roland ahlbrand
